snippet.title: Turbo Sloths - Christmas Update - Trailer
snippet.description:
Turbo Sloths - combat racing game for PC an consoles with split screen mode. 
Let us introduce you to the Christmas update! 
Snowy locations!
Christmas tree and snowmen
Weather - snowfall
Cheer up for the Christmas holidays!

Great Music: Crossbones' Creed - Tonight https://vk.com/crossbonescreed

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1443630/Turbo_Sloths/
If you like it please add our game to wishlist on steam. Thanks!
Our discord https://discord.gg/J7YycADSVu

In game you will find:
- defferent locations of planet Turia.
- weapons - mashine gun, shot gun, rail gun, shock wave, shields and other. 
- different game modes + arena mode. 
- garage where you can upgrade your turbojunks. 
- split screen mode for playing with friends. 
- career mode about 8 hours. 
- a lot of enemies warbots and bosses. 


Follow us: 
https://twitter.com/RainStylegames
https://www.facebook.com/gaming/RainStyle.games
https://www.reddit.com/user/rainstyle
See you in our game!
